name: buffer
desc: The buffer module will calculate the distance from every node in the input field to the input line and add this distance as a data component.

properties.name: Limit Depth
properties.desc: Limit Depth allows for setting a ZMinDepth and ZMaxDepth thus creating (passing) a fence that only extends to those specified elevations.

properties.name: Z Min Depth
properties.desc: If the Limit Depth toggle is selected the Z Min Depth is the minimum cut depth.

properties.name: Z Max Depth
properties.desc: If the Limit Depth toggle is selected the Z Max Depth is the maximum cut depth.
